title: Independence National Historical Park: Park Home
body: "We hold these Truths to be self-evident, that all Men are created equal..."  Independence Hall echoes these words. Nearby the old cracked Bell proclaims liberty. The spirit of Franklin is alive in his adopted city. Become part of America's journey in discovering its past.                Visiting the Liberty Bell Center   See this international symbol of liberty.  No tickets are needed.        Visiting Independence Hall   Entrance to Independence Hall is by tour only. Tickets are required March through December.  No tickets are required in January and February              Benjamin Franklin Museum   Explore a state-of-the-art museum honoring Philadelphia's own Benjamin Franklin.        Special Programs   Enjoy some really unique offerings.        Vote now!   Help us decide what goes into our NPS Centennial Time Capsule. Vote now!
